test.name: Test

kw.name: Abrir conexões com as APIs
Set Log Level
kw.msg: Log level changed from INFO to TRACE.
kw.doc: Sets the log threshold to the specified level.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=API_OPERACOES, url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Gerar tokens para os perfis de usuários
Realizar o login de um usuário
Criar o body da request conforme o template JSON
Load Json From File
kw.doc: Load JSON from file.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Retorna um JSON conforme o path do template informado

kw.name: Alterar o valor do campo no body
Update Value To Json
kw.doc: Update value to JSON using JSONPath

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Altera o valor do campo conforme o path informado. E retorna o Body alterado

kw.name: Alterar o valor do campo no body
Update Value To Json
kw.doc: Update value to JSON using JSONPath

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Altera o valor do campo conforme o path informado. E retorna o Body alterado

kw.name: Enviar requisição para gerar o token do usuário
POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/users/login path_url=/users/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '44', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"username": "123456", "password": "string"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Envia a requisição para autenticar e gerar o token de um usuário e retorna um Object Response da API

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Fatal Error
kw.doc: Stops the whole test execution.

branch.msg: Invalid IF condition: Evaluating expression '"${TOKEN.json()[\'access_token\']}" == "${EMPTY}"' failed: Resolving variable '${TOKEN.json()['access_token']}' failed: KeyError: 'access_token'

kw.doc: Realiza o login conforme os dados de usuário informados e retorna o token gerado

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Realizar o login de um usuário
kw.doc: Realiza o login conforme os dados de usuário informados e retorna o token gerado

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Realizar o login de um usuário
kw.doc: Realiza o login conforme os dados de usuário informados e retorna o token gerado

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
Gera os tokens de acesso para os perfis de usuários e grava em variáveis globais
kw.status: Invalid IF condition: Evaluating expression '"${TOKEN.json()[\'access_token\']}" == "${EMPTY}"' failed: Resolving variable '${TOKEN.json()['access_token']}' failed: KeyError: 'access_token'

kw.doc: Cria uma sessão para todas as APIs do sistema, que serão utilizadas nos testes, e gera os tokens de acesso (gravando em variáveis globais)
kw.status: Invalid IF condition: Evaluating expression '"${TOKEN.json()[\'access_token\']}" == "${EMPTY}"' failed: Resolving variable '${TOKEN.json()['access_token']}' failed: KeyError: 'access_token'

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects
